title: Guns are not toys
body:
https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2017/06/in-attempt-to-achieve-youtube-stardom-woman-accidentally-kills-her-boyfriend/

Can we please require firearm safety classes for anyone wanting to own a gun?  I don't know if it would have helped this idiot, but this is like the third story I've heard this week where an idiot shot someone.
